actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to designate February 22, May 30, and October 12 as Washington's Birthday, Memorial Day and Columbus Day, respectively, and to make such days legal public holidays.

summary.text: Designates February 22 as Washington's Birthday instead of the third Monday in February; May 30 as Memorial Day instead of the last Monday in May; and October 12 as Columbus Day instead of the second Monday in October. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 6103 (a))

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate February 22, May 30, and October 12 as Washington's Birthday, Memorial Day and Columbus Day, respectively, and to make such days legal public holidays.
